  • public class Rule
extends java.lang.Object
    Rule ::= LHS ==> RHS. Obligatory rewrite LHS ?=> RHS. Optional rewrite /Â­- Clause. Permanent, unresourced fact Values for variables on LHS are unified with variables on the RHS
